Module com.example.schedulesoft
Package com.example.schedulesoft.controller

Class CustomerTableController

java.lang.Object
com.example.schedulesoft.controller.CustomerTableController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerTableController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller managing the interactions between the customer table (view) and the customer model and table (back-end)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller

      Lambda expression attached to listener to handle events (row being selected in table)

      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onAdd

      private void onAdd()
      Sets selected customer to null in model and changes view to customer form

    • onEdit

      private void onEdit()
      Changes view to customer form

    • onDelete

      private void onDelete()
      Attempts to delete the selected customer in table from the database

      An alert dialog box will be shown indicating that the customer's appointments will be deleted if the customer is deleted If the users selects "OK", the customer's appointments will be deleted along with the customer

      lambda 1: used for formatting all of the customer's appointments lambda 2: used for deleting all the customer's appointments

    • setCellValueFactoryOfColumns

      private void setCellValueFactoryOfColumns()
      Sets the cell value factory for the customer table columns

      Lambda setting the cell value factory for each column in table

    • getAppointments

      private List<Appointment> getAppointments(Customer customer)
      Gets all the appointments of the given customer

      Lambda attached to stream used for filtering through only the customer's appointments

      Parameters:
      customer - customer with 0 or more appointments
      Returns:
      a list of all the customer's appointments

    • showConfirmationAlert

      private Optional<javafx.scene.control.ButtonType> showConfirmationAlert(String headerText, String contentText)
      Confirmation alert shown to user when deleting a customer
      Parameters:
      headerText - header text for alert
      contentText - body text for alert
